If I reject, the money will be worth 950,000$ next round (5% less), but I'll get to make the proposal. I could offer a more equitable split, and Alice would face similar pressure to avoid further devaluation.

Given that this is round 1 of 12 possible rounds, I have room to negotiate for a fairer deal. The loss from one round of inflation is worth it to establish a more balanced negotiating position.
